issues.message: Add a <title> tag to this page.
Rename this parameter "expectedPath" to match the regular expression ^[_a-z][a-z0-9_]*$.
Add "lang" and/or "xml:lang" attributes to this "<html>" element
Rename this field "testPlan" to match the regular expression ^[_a-z][_a-z0-9]*$.
Insert a <!DOCTYPE> declaration to before this <html> tag.
Remove this useless assignment to variable "didntFillReason".
TypeError can be thrown as "mockUsername" might be null or undefined here.
This line will not be executed conditionally; only the first line of this 5-line block will be. The rest will execute unconditionally.
This function expects 1 argument, but 3 were provided.
'l' is already declared in the upper scope.
